publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1509 Richard Lochhead: Cod Recovery Plan—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to promote, as a matter of urgency, an alternative cod recovery plan for the North Sea to that currently tabled by the European Commission; recognises that the current proposals discriminate against Scotland, will devastate the Scots fishing fleet and completely fail to conserve fish stocks that are vital to Scotland, and urges the Scottish Executive and all relevant EU bodies to work closely with the industry to draw up a plan that will regenerate stocks while safeguarding the future of our fishing communities. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Tricia Marwick*, Irene McGugan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Colin Campbell*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Alex Salmond*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Alasdair Morgan*, Brian Adam*, Michael Matheson*, Michael Russell*, Shona Robison*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr John Munro*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, David Mundell*, Mr Murray Tosh*
S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Alex Fergusson*, Phil Gallie*, Kay Ullrich*, Mr Keith Harding*, Alex Johnstone*
S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-1509 Richard Lochhead: Cod Recovery Plan—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to promote, as a matter of urgency, an alternative cod recovery plan for the North Sea to that currently tabled by the European Commission; recognises that the current proposals discriminate against Scotland, will devastate the Scots fishing fleet and completely fail to conserve fish stocks that are vital to Scotland, and urges the Scottish Executive and all relevant EU bodies to work closely with the industry to draw up a plan that will regenerate stocks while safeguarding the future of our fishing communities. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Tricia Marwick, Irene McGugan, Mr Adam Ingram, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Colin Campbell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Andrew Welsh, Alasdair Morgan, Brian Adam, Michael Matheson, Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr John Munro, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, David Mundell, Mr Murray Tosh, Alex Fergusson, Phil Gallie, Kay Ullrich, Mr Keith Harding, Alex Johnstone, Dr Winnie Ewing, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Mr David Davidson*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Mr Brian Monteith*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mary Scanlon*, Linda Fabiani*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Nick Johnston*

S1M-1509 Richard Lochhead: Cod Recovery Plan—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to promote, as a matter of urgency, an alternative cod recovery plan for the North Sea to that currently tabled by the European Commission; recognises that the current proposals discriminate against Scotland, will devastate the Scots fishing fleet and completely fail to conserve fish stocks that are vital to Scotland, and urges the Scottish Executive and all relevant EU bodies to work closely with the industry to draw up a plan that will regenerate stocks while safeguarding the future of our fishing communities. S1M-1509 Cod Recovery Plan (lodged on 9 January 2001) Donald Gorrie*
